item.description:
Baxter's Boat House Restaurant for Dinner, Drinks & Entertainment

With Carroll Hill on the piano Saturday night from 7pm-11pm

Note: Baxter's does not take reservations so their may be a short wait. Plan on meeting for cocktails first at 7:00 pm and dinner for 7:30 pm. Meet you inside the entrance!

Baxter's is one of the oldest Cape Cod restaurants, established in 1957. It is built entirely over the water and has great views of the harbor activities, including the ferry boats going to Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard and local commercial fishing boats unloading their catch. The Renowned Baxter's Boathouse Club features live entertainment on the piano and is the ideal place for summer relaxation . . .

Baxter's waterfront dining is famous for its Fresh Seafood including fried clams, fish n' chips, oysters, scallops, and broiled scrod, native steamers, steamed lobster as well as many other local seafood dining specialties ...The menu includes Fresh Seafood, Appetizers, Salads, Sandwiches, Chowder, Seafood Bisque and other great choices for landlubbers too, check out our cape cod restaurant menu.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my infamous pink hat!
